definition.text: The User Manual covers Superalgos from A to Z, starting with a comprehensive conceptual introduction. The book covers functionality and features, along with the description of each hierarchy. It is organized for continuous reading and will take you from the starter to the advanced Superalgos user level.

paragraphs.text: I->Superalgos->Topic->Introduction->Superalgos is a comprehensive platform integrating all the crucial elements that make up trading intelligence. This chapter offers a conceptual introduction explaining some of the main design principles and the fundamental concepts behind their implementation.
II->Superalgos->Topic->Network->The network hierarchy organizes the infrastructure to run bots and store data. It is the hierarchy you will use the most to operate the system.
